title: Gold 4 team looking for top, adc and jungle mains
body:
I AM LOOKING FOR a top, adc and a jungle main who are keen to commit to my team. The players we have at the moment are nice and have good attitudes. We communicate a lot and we spend time to make team comps and organize picks and bans. I wish to make this team legit as in be in diamond for r5. Recently players have had jobs which have made things hard for us since they work at night. So we are looking for 3 new players to join us. In saying this players must be at least Plat.

Please you must be available at 8pm on weekdays, weekends are a bit hard to pin point exactly when we will play but if you communicate to me when you think you will be home that would HELP. You must be 18+ ( this is because I am done with dealing with trolls).

We are a serious team, I am easy going and if people upset you I do deal with it. You won't be raged at, you will find we are a group of boys who are good mates even though most of us met over THE NET. I am looking for dedicated players who will commit because we do play almost every night. I sincerely want to meet and add players who will become good friends but overall grow together as a team and improve as a whole. 

Please have skype and add me my ign is skt1 DemonSlayer

replies.body: Try outs will start tomorrow at 8pm. Please add me before hand so we can organise the team. Thank you.
Hey mate, could I try out for your top lane position? I'm 18 and have flexible a hours
I can show up for try outs 8pm
